original_title: Brawl leads to brutal murder in Mawathagama
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Sri Lanka Police have arrested seven people in connection with a brutal murder in Maswewa, Mawathagama.
Police said that the murder was the result of a heated exchange that broke out last night.
The deceased was a 24-year-old man, and another 22-year-old male injured in the incident is being treated at the Kurunegala Teaching Hospital.
